message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product at an exclusive price of $9,500. This is a special opportunity tailored just for you, considering the value you see in it. I believe this offer will be beneficial for both of us.

Thanks for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the opportunity, $9,500 is a bit above my budget. I'm happy to pay $9,000 for the product. This price is fair considering the value it holds for both of us.  Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and would like to make a counteroffer. Considering the value we both see in the product, I propose a price of $9,200. This is my best offer, and I hope it aligns more closely with your budget while still reflecting the product's worth.
